comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Ginger Stanley's IMDB page: www.imdb.com/name/nm0822483/ As Ginger Stanley Hallowell, she attended the 50th anniversary celebration of the film "Creature from the Black Lagoon" in 2003: www.the-reelgillman.com/news/50thcreaturefest.html Same smile, 52 years on. She performed in the mermaid show at Weeki Watchee Springs, and was on hand for the show's 60th anniversary in 2007: www.newsday.com/news/local/state/orl-mermaids2807jul28,0,... Another photo of Ginger Stanley from these years: www.ocala.com/article/20080127/FEATURES03/801270308/1027/...
